title: Heinrich Lischka
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809062233/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809062233/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Heinrich Lischka**

Graphic and type designer from Köthen, Germany. His font label is called [Font Boutique](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809062233/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Boutique).

website: [http://www.fontboutique.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809062233/http:/www.fontboutique.de/ "http://www.fontboutique.de") + [http://www.typografski.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809062233/http:/www.typografski.de/ "http://www.typografski.de")
author: Dav
